wikipedia_page.main: Patricia Lesley Hollis, Baroness Hollis of Heigham, PC, DL (née Wells; 24 May 1941 – 13 October 2018) was an historian and Labour member of the House of Lords of the United Kingdom.

response: *  1941   – Patricia Hollis, Baroness Hollis of Heigham, English academic and politician

UEA has benefited from the services of academics at the top of their fields, including Sir Malcolm Bradbury and Sir Angus Wilson who co-founded the MA in Creative Writing programme;‘BRADBURY, Sir Malcolm (Stanley)’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014‘WILSON, Sir Angus (Frank Johnstone)’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Hubert Lamb who founded the Climatic Research Unit; Lord Zuckerman who was influential in the establishment of the School of Environmental Sciences; Nobel Prize–winning chemist Richard Synge; scientists Sir David King,‘KING, Sir David (Anthony)’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Sir David Baulcombe,‘BAULCOMBE, Prof. Sir David (Charles)’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Jenni Barclay, Tom Wigley, Godfrey Hewitt, Michael Balls, Andrew Watson,‘WATSON, Prof. Andrew James’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Christopher Lamb,‘LAMB, Prof. Christopher John’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Alan Katritzky,‘KATRITZKY, Prof. Alan Roy’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Jean Palutikof, Michael Gale,‘GALE, Michael Denis’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Roy Markham,‘MARKHAM, Roy’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Geoffrey Boulton,‘BOULTON, Prof. Geoffrey Stewart’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Johnson Cann,‘CANN, Prof. Johnson Robin’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Hans Joachim Schellnhuber,‘SCHELLNHUBER, Prof. Hans Joachim, (John)’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 John Alwyne Kitching,‘KITCHING, John Alwyne’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Thomas Bennet-Clark,‘BENNET-CLARK, Thomas Archibald’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 Jeremy Greenwood,‘GREENWOOD, Dr Jeremy John Denis’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 Tracy Palmer and Sophien Kamoun; mathematician Peter Chadwick; writers Angela Carter and Sarah Churchwell; poet George Szirtes; poet laureate Sir Andrew Motion‘MOTION, Sir Andrew’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 historians Sir Richard Evans, Paul Kennedy, Patricia Hollis‘HOLLIS OF HEIGHAM’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 and Michael Balfour; art historians Peter Lasko and Eric Fernie; historian Stephen Church; philosophers Martin Hollis‘HOLLIS, Prof. (James) Martin’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2007 and Andreas Dorschel;‘DORSCHEL, Prof. Andreas’, Kürschners Deutscher Gelehrten-Kalender 2014. Bio-bibliographisches Verzeichnis deutschsprachiger Wissenschaftler der Gegenwart, ed. Axel Schniederjürgen, 26th edition, vol. 1 (A–G), De Gruyter, Berlin – Boston, Mass. 2014, p. 663. psychologist Dame Shirley Pearce; musician Sir Philip Ledger;‘LEDGER, Sir Philip (Stevens)’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2007 political scientists Lord Williams of Baglan and Sir Steve Smith; former Greek Finance Minister Yanis Varoufakis, and the High Court Judges Sir Clive Lewis‘LEWIS, Hon. Sir Clive (Buckland)’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 and Dame Beverley Lang.‘LANG, Dame Beverley Ann Macnaughton’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014
